entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING ENDED, Melita
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:35 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Melita 11:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
Temperature: -8.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -10.0°C
Wind: NNE 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:37 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:37 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:37 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
